mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT de.device_id, de.car_id, car.ward_id, car.car_no, ward.ward_name FROM VL_DEVICE_INFO AS de, IS_WARDCAR AS car, IS_WARD AS ward WHERE de.car_id = car.car_id AND car.ward_id = ward.ward_id AND car.use_yn = 'Y' AND device_serial = #{device_serial} ORDER BY entry_datetime DESC ) AS t LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT (coalesce(max(ems_id), to_char(now(), 'yyyymmddhh24')||'00000')::bigint +1)::varchar AS ems_id FROM VL_EMS_EVENT WHERE ems_id > to_char(now(), 'yyyymmddhh24')||'00000'
INSERT INTO VL_EMS_EVENT ( ems_id, device_id, ward_id, car_id, proc_cd, stat_start_dtime, dsr_seq, p_camera_id, d_camera_id, f_camera_id ) VALUES ( #{ems_id}, #{device_id}, #{ward_id}, #{car_id}, #{proc_cd}, #{dateTime}, #{fireSeq}, #{camera1}, #{camera2}, #{camera3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE VL_EMS_EVENT SET proc_cd = #{proc_cd}, stat_end_dtime = #{arrDateTime}, epn_id = #{epn_id} WHERE ems_id = #{ems_id}
UPDATE VL_EMS_EVENT SET m_input_yn = 'Y' WHERE ems_id = #{ems_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VL_EMS_EVENT_HIST ( ems_id, proc_cd, arrhirano, date ) VALUES ( #{ems_id}, #{proc_cd}, #{arrHiraNo}, to_timestamp(#{dateTime}, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
mapper.select: SELECT guide_message, guide_order, guide_activation, guide_deactivation, guide_group FROM ERMCT.GET_FAL_GUIDE_MESSAGE(#{ems_id})
SELECT fa_help, collected_code, collected_value, collected_date FROM ERMCT.GET_FAG_GUIDE(#{ems_id})

select min("01002") as "01002", min("01003") as "01003", min("01004") as "01004", min("01005") as "01005" from( select case when act = '01002' then '1' else '2' end as "01002", case when act = '01003' then '1' else '2' end as "01003", case when act = '01004' then '1' else '2' end as "01004", case when act = '01005' then '1' else '2' end as "01005" from( --심정지 select case when count(*) >0 then '01002' else '' end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code in ('P000056','P000057','P000058','P000059','P000060') and value in ('C000059','C000103','C000147','C000191','C000235', 'C000062','C000106','C000150','C000194','C000238') order by code, value, date desc ) a1_1 where cancel = 'N' union all -- 중증외상 select case when sum(cnt) > 0 then '01003' end as act from( select case when count(distinct code) >= 2 and min(code) = 'P000062' then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000062' and value = 'C000261') or (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000067' and value = 'C000310') or (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000070' and value in ('C000323','C000324','C000325','C000326','C000327')) order by code, value, date desc ) a2_1 where cancel = 'N' union all select case when sum(cnt) = 2 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select case when count(distinct code) = 2 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000062' and value = 'C000261') or (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000070' and value = 'C000320') order by code, value, date desc ) a2_2 where cancel = 'N' union all select case when max(value)::numeric >= 55 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000040' and isnumeric(value) order by code, value, date desc ) a2_3 where cancel = 'N' ) b2 union all select case when sum(cnt) = 2 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select case when count(distinct code) = 2 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000062' and value = 'C000261') or (ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000070' and value in ('C000321','C000322')) order by code, value, date desc ) a2_4 where cancel = 'N' union all select case when max(value)::numeric >= 55 or max(value)::numeric <= 10 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000040' and isnumeric(value) order by code, value, date desc ) a2_5 where cancel = '1' ) b3 ) a2 union all -- 심혈관계 select case when sum(act) = 3 then '01004' end as act from ( select case when max(value)::numeric >= 15 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000040' and isnumeric(value) order by code, value, date desc ) a3_1 where cancel = 'N' union ALL select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000062' and value = 'C000260' order by code, value, date desc ) a3_2 where cancel = 'N' union ALL select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code in ('P000056','P000057','P000058','P000059','P000060') and value in ('C000041','C000085','C000129','C000173','C000217', 'C000061','C000105','C000149','C000193','C000237', 'C000058','C000102','C000146','C000190','C000234', 'C000060','C000104','C000148','C000192','C000236', 'C000064','C000108','C000152','C000196','C000240') order by code, value, date desc ) a3_3 where cancel = 'N' ) a3 union all -- 뇌혈관계 select case when sum(act) = 3 then '01005' end as act from ( select case when max(value)::numeric >= 15 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000040' and isnumeric(value) order by code, value, date desc ) a4_1 where cancel = 'N' union ALL select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code = 'P000062' and value = 'C000260' order by code, value, date desc ) a4_2 where cancel = 'N' union ALL select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as act from ( select distinct on (code, value) code, value, date, cancel from vl_ems_sa_hist where ems_id = #{ems_id} and code in ('P000056','P000057','P000058','P000059','P000060') and value in ('C000040','C000084','C000128','C000172','C000216', 'C000078','C000122','C000166','C000210','C000254', 'C000055','C000099','C000143','C000187','C000231', 'C000063','C000107','C000151','C000195','C000239', 'C000064','C000108','C000152','C000196','C000240', 'C000079','C000123','C000167','C000211','C000255') order by code, value, date desc ) a4_3 where cancel = 'N' ) a4 ) tb where tb notnull ) tb2
